content: i know there are a lot of beanie patterns out here but here i am adding one more the basic pattern is very simple and allows a lot of flexibility to create different looks and not to mention it is a great stash buster for all the odd left over yarns the beanie is knitted completely in the round from bottom up **----------------------------------------------------------------** **like our patterns ** get our email updates 1 to hear about new designs and subscriber-only special offers **----------------------------------------------------------------** **sizes ** 6-12 months 1-3t 3-5t 5-8 years **to fit head ** 41-46 46-51 48-54 51-56 cm or 16-18 18-20 19-21 20-22 **notions** 3 5 mm/us #4 circular needles 30 or 40 cm/12 or 16 4 mm/us #6 circular needles 40 cm/16 4 mm/us #6 double pointed needles or long circular for magic looping stitch marker **yarn required** 83 100 114 128 meters or 90 110 125 140 yards of dk wool yarn use either a single color or several enjoy 1 http //etsy us14 list-manage com/subscribe u=b8a29f2dbeada99b849a99f46&id=6017fcce06
